## Cross validation

# Essaie avec full_time_results comme training set

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}

premier_league_results$full_time_results = as.factor(premier_league_results$full_time_results) #to transform our response variable to a factor in order to take into consideration the levels

train_indexes = createDataPartition(premier_league_results$full_time_results,p=0.8,list=FALSE) # p percentage of the training set, in this case 80%

train_data = premier_league_results[train_indexes,]  #this is the training set

test_data = premier_league_results[-train_indexes,]  #the test set

reasampling_method1 = trainControl(method  = "cv",number  = 10) 
#cv means cross-validation and the number 10 means 10 folds
#reasampling _method is control to use when training a model

```
